description.p: openterfaceQT is a cross-platform application that supports both aarch64 and x86 architectures. It serves as a comprehensive control interface for openterface-Mini-KVM devices. Use openterfaceQT and openterface-Mini-KVM can control any headless device via HDMI and USB.

ul.li: Improved device permissions: Updated udev rules for serial and HID devices by replacing MODE="0666" with TAG+="uaccess", making device access more secure and less permissive.
Optimized translation handling: Fixed an issue where translation and keyboard layout files were being generated automatically; these files are now loaded directly from Qt's resource system.
Enhanced CI workflow: Updated the Windows build GitHub Action so that version updates automatically trigger dependent actions for recompilation.
Fixed unnecessary file extraction: Resolved an issue where certain .qm files were being extracted every time the application was launched.

description.p: Fix the German layout match error, fix while changing the resolution in the software caused the display to become oversized and go beyond the screen boundaries.
Fix bug during the action of pasting that caused the main window to become blocked.
